summary: Failed activity heartbeat data conversion could crash the worker. The system didn't catch data conversion errors during heartbeats and should instead report them as activity cancellations to handle them gracefully.
userImpact: Worker could crash when activity heartbeat data conversion fails, disrupting workflow execution.
rootCause: Data conversion errors during activity heartbeat processing were not caught, causing unhandled exceptions.
proposedFix: Catch data conversion errors during heartbeat and report them as activity cancellations instead of crashing.
resolutionDetails: Issue was fixed and resolved in a previous update.
keyQuote: We don't catch DC errors, we should instead report those back as activity cancellations.
